resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using Extended Similes to Elaborate and Add Style</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgedehntes Similes verwenden, um auszuarbeitn 
und Art hinzuzufügen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des Comparaisons étendues pour 
élaborer et pour ajouter le modèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando Similes prolongado elaborar e adicionar o 
estilo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando Similes esteso per elaborare ed aggiungere 
stile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας εκτεταμένα similes για να 
διαμορφώσει και να προσθέσει το ύφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando Similes extendido para elaborar y para 
agregar estilo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will analyze a series of extended similes, develop criteria for strong and weak extended similes, and begin using extended similes as a tool for elaboration in their own writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer analysieren eine Reihe ausgedehnte 
similes, entwickeln Kriterien für die starken und schwachen 
ausgedehnten similes und fangen an, ausgedehnte similes als 
Hilfsmittel für Ausarbeitung in ihrem eigenen Schreiben zu verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants analyseront une série de 
comparaisons étendues, développeront des critères pour des 
comparaisons étendues fortes et faibles, et commenceront à utiliser 
des comparaisons étendues comme outil pour l'élaboration dans leur 
propre écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes analisarão uma série de similes 
prolongados, desenvolverão critérios para similes prolongados fortes
e fracos, e começarão a usar similes prolongados como uma ferramenta
para o elaboration em sua própria escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi analizzeranno una serie di similes 
estesi, svilupperanno i test di verifica per i similes estesi forti e 
deboli e cominceranno a usando i similes estesi come strumento per 
elaborazione nella loro propria scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναλύσουν μια σειρά εκτεταμένα 
similes, θα ορίσουν τα κριτήρια για ισχυρά και αδύνατα 
εκτεταμένα similes, και θα αρχίσουν εκτεταμένα similes ως 
εργαλείο για την επεξεργασία στο γράψιμό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes analizarán una serie de similes 
extendidos, desarrollarán los criterios para los similes extendidos 
fuertes y débiles, y comenzarán a usar similes extendidos como 
herramienta para la elaboración en su propia escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JENNIFER SMYTH
FN:JENNIFER SMYTH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104026</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/using-extended-similes-to-elaborate-and-add-style</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
